name: CareConnect-ConditionRelationship-1-Extension
description: A reference to another related condition (target) whose relationship is defined by the relationship type code.

element.definition: A reference to another condition (target) whose relationship is defined by the relationship type code.

element.name: type
element.short: Relationship type - combined | grouped | replaces | evolved-from | onset
element.definition: A code specifying the kind of relationship that exists with the target condition.

binding.description: A set of codes specifying the kind of relationship that exists with a target condition.

element.name: target
element.definition: A reference to the target condition resource that is related to this condition.
